doc.after: Health informatics also called health care informatics healthcare informatics medical informatics nursing informatics clinical informatics or biomedical informatics is informatics in health care It is a multidisciplinary field that uses health information technology HIT to improve health care via any combination of higher quality higher efficiency spurring lower cost and thus greater availability and new opportunities The disciplines involved include information science computer science social science behavioral science management science and others It deals with the resources devices and methods required to optimize the acquisition storage retrieval and use of information in health and biomedicine Health informatics tools include amongst others computers clinical guidelines formal medical terminologies and information and communication systems 1 It is applied to the areas of nursing clinical care dentistry pharmacy public health occupational therapy physical therapy and bio medical research and alternative medicine too 2
